item2: Set program permissions for each user
item4: Basic user data has been created
item5: User ID, user name, department name
item6: Program data, update user authorization data
item7: If there is no matching user data, the system will prompt to find no such group information
item8: Enter query conditions or select user code and click Query to query user authorization data
item9: After setting permissions, you need to log in to the system again to take effect.
